import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import Profile from'../components/Profile';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProfilePage(){const{username}=useParams();const[user,setUser]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchUser=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("https://api.github.com/users/".concat(username));// const response = await fetch(`https://api.github.com/users/sudheerj`);
const userData=await response.json();setUser(userData);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching user data:',error);}};fetchUser();},[username]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Profile,{user:user}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."})});}export default ProfilePage;
